finnish.title: The Good News of Jesus Christ
finnish.Question1: List the various questions raised in this portion of Scripture. Who makes them? To whom are they made?
finnish.Question2: Have you ever asked any questions like these? When? To whom?
finnish.Question3: Does this portion of Scripture raise any fresh questions in your own heart and mind? What are they?
finnish.Question4: Write a trusted mentor with a question you may have about this portion of Scripture.
